Game: Zombies Seeker Fight off hordes of the undead as they seek out the living in Zombiez Seeker. Struggle for survival as infected, snarling zombies set to turn you into a mindless decaying corpse with a hunger for human flesh. Armed with deadly weapons, you must fight your way through the living dead or find yourself walking among them. Features • Choose from 3 fatal weapons to annihilate zombies• Single player mode or play co-op with a friend• 5 levels of intense zombie combat in a graveyard, church and more! <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/83cd56f9-275b-4fb3-b585-cf7be5fcdd1f.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/9e91ed76-15bd-42cf-bd7a-01cda320ec93.jpg
